author: Tom G.
text: Great bar, often filled with expats. Wednesday karaoke brings out a good, friendly, sociable crowd. Chill and welcoming vibe. Friendly and attentive bartenders.

author: Sarah D.
text: I wouldn’t mind finding myself here at the end of the world. A friendly place with excellent local craft brews… My idea of the perfect bar.

author: Amir H.
text: We had great moments that night. The menu was full of different drinks… That night we tried karaoke, board games, and dancing. You should try it at least once.
